meanings.definition: A small piece of luggage typically used for carrying clothing and personal items.
meanings.sent1: She packed her favorite dress in the valise for the trip.
meanings.sent2: The traveler carried a red valise with her on the train.
meanings.sent3: The valise looked like a tiny closet with wheels.
meanings.sent4: Her valise held memories of adventures from around the world.
meanings.sent5: The worn valise bore the marks of countless journeys.

meanings.definition: To pack or carry in a valise.
meanings.sent1: He valised his essentials quickly before the journey.
meanings.sent2: She valises her belongings neatly to fit everything.
meanings.sent3: They valised their picnic items in a rush before the rain.
meanings.sent4: The magician valised a rabbit for his next trick.
meanings.sent5: Valising efficiently can save time when traveling.
